org.agreement_technologies.service.map_landmarks

Class LGNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_landmarks.LGNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LandmarkNode

    public class LGNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements LandmarkNode
    LGNode class implements a node in the landmarks graph (LG).
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.agreement_technologies.common.map_landmarks.LandmarkNode

        DISJUNCTION, SINGLE_LITERAL

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LGNode(LandmarkFluent lit)
      Constructs a new node which consists of a single fluents.
      LGNode(LandmarkSet u)
      Constructs a new node which consists of a disjunction of fluents.
